name: AbsenceOfCervix
title: Absence of cervix
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Acquired absence of the cervix, agenesis of the cervix),(Data Element Scope: ICD10-CM codes that represent an absence of the cervix),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent acquired or congenital absence of the cervix. Codes that represent absence of other organs must also mention absence of the cervix to be included.),(Exclusion Criteria: Partial absence of the cervix, absence of the vagina or the uterus if the cervix is not included, other congenital abnormalities of the cervix)

concept.display: Acquired absence of both cervix and uterus
Acquired absence of cervix with remaining uterus

contains.display: Acquired absence of both cervix and uterus
Acquired absence of cervix with remaining uterus
